LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Notes
LocaleResource.Value: If you're using this gateway, ensure that your primary store currency is supported by Dintero.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Fields.SandboxURL.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Where to send sandbox transactions. Please enter the URL without 'https://' for example 'checkout.dintero.com'.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Fields.ProductionURL.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Where to send real transactions. Please enter the URL without 'https://' for example 'checkout.dintero.com'.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Fields.UseShippingAddressAsBilling.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check if you want to use the shipping address as a billing address.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Fields.AdditionalFee.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter additional fee to charge your customers.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Fields.AdditionalFeePercentage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether to apply a percentage additional fee to the order total. If not enabled, a fixed value is used.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Redirect.Payment.Link.Message
LocaleResource.Value: For payment you will be redirected to Dintero.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugin.Payments.Dintero.IPNHandler.Error.Message
LocaleResource.Value: Something went wrong, Please try again your payment process.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Fields.DefaultAddressId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If cutomer not have shipping address and address then this address id will be use for address.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Fields.FallbackPhoneNo.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If cutomer not have phone number in shipping address then this phone number will be use for shipping address object.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Fields.SandboxDinteroCheckoutWebSDKEndpoint
LocaleResource.Value: Sandbox dintero checkout web SDK endpoint

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Fields.SandboxDinteroCheckoutWebSDKEndpoint.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Where to send sandbox transactions. for example 'https://checkout.test.dintero.com'.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Fields.SandboxAuthEndpoint.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Where to send sandbox transactions. Please enter the URL without 'https://' for example 'checkout.dintero.com'.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Fields.ProductionDinteroCheckoutWebSDKEndpoint
LocaleResource.Value: Production dintero checkout web SDK endpoint

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Fields.ProductionDinteroCheckoutWebSDKEndpoint.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Where to send sandbox transactions. for example 'https://checkout.test.dintero.com'

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Fields.ProductionAuthEndpoint.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Where to send real transactions. Please enter the URL without 'https://' for example 'checkout.dintero.com'.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Fields.SandboxAuthAudience.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Where to send sandbox transactions. Please enter the URL without 'https://' for example 'checkout.dintero.com'.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.Dintero.Fields.ProductionAuthAudience.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Where to send real transactions. Please enter the URL without 'https://' for example 'checkout.dintero.com'.
